name: Pixels
description:
Apply Pixelate / 8bit Effect Filter on images. Raster & Vector.


________


1. How does it work ?


• select one (or many) shape with an image fill

• use slider to set sample size value (it starts with a 16x16 pixel grid size)

• click on "Apply"

• a new Pixelate fill is added to your shape


tip : you can edit min, max and current Slider values.


________


2. Vector mode :


• select one shape (only) with an image fill

• use the slider to set the sample size value

• click on "Vectorize"

• a new group, filled with rectangles representing the pixels, is added to the page


note : "Vectorizing" an image can take time, so there is a limit of 20 000 blocks (depending on image and sample size)
